message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand you're interested in the product, and I'm happy to meet you halfway. However, I need to make a profit, so I can offer you the product for $108. Let me know if that works for you.
I'm still a bit short on budget, so I can do $105, but I'm willing to meet you halfway on the $108. Can you do $106?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Bob. I'm willing to make a slight concession, so I can offer you the product for $107.50. Let me know if that's acceptable to you.
I'm getting close, but I still need to save a bit more. Can you do $106.50?
I'm willing to make one more concession, Bob. I can offer you the product for $107. It's the best I can do, but I think you'll really appreciate the quality of this product.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit short. Can you do $106?
I'm not willing to go any lower than $106.50, Bob. I think that's a fair price considering the value this product brings. If you're still interested, I can meet you at that price.
